hero.title: Ethical fancy rat breeding, grounded in responsibility.
hero.subtitle: We care more about long-term, stable temperament and health than short-term output or appearance. Transparent records and traceable boundaries are central to how Ratopia operates.

body.text: Ratopia is a small-scale fancy rat rattery. We focus on temperament that can thrive in long-term companionship, health outcomes that can be tracked over time, and welfare standards that are practical and consistently applied.

My goal is not to chase rare colors or markings, but to build lines that are more stable and predictable: more human-friendly in everyday interaction, more manageable in stress response, and able to maintain relatively consistent health across multiple generations.

items: Pairings prioritize temperament and health, supported by traceable pedigree records and inbreeding-coefficient tracking
Housing is built around zoned space and enrichment—not bare-minimum survival setups
Adoptions follow a written agreement, with long-term communication and take-back/support responsibility when needed
